storyTitle: As Employee, I want to submit schedule change requests to achieve timely updates to my work schedule

testCases.title: Validate successful schedule change request submission with valid data
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system with valid credentials
Employee has necessary permissions to submit schedule change requests
Schedule change request page is accessible
Test attachment file (PDF, 5MB) is prepared for upload

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule change request page from the main dashboard or menu
steps.expectedResult: Schedule change request form is displayed with all mandatory fields visible including: Employee Name, Current Schedule, Requested Schedule, Reason for Change, Effective Date, and Attachment Upload option

steps.action: Enter valid data in Employee Name field (e.g., 'John Smith')
steps.expectedResult: Employee Name field accepts the input without any validation errors

steps.action: Enter valid Current Schedule details (e.g., 'Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM')
steps.expectedResult: Current Schedule field accepts the input without any validation errors

steps.action: Enter valid Requested Schedule details (e.g., 'Monday-Friday, 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM')
steps.expectedResult: Requested Schedule field accepts the input without any validation errors

steps.action: Enter valid Reason for Change (e.g., 'Need to accommodate childcare schedule')
steps.expectedResult: Reason for Change field accepts the input without any validation errors

steps.action: Select valid Effective Date using date picker (e.g., a date 7 days in the future)
steps.expectedResult: Effective Date field accepts the selected date in correct format without validation errors

steps.action: Click on the attachment upload button and select a valid file (PDF, 5MB)
steps.expectedResult: File upload progress indicator appears, file is successfully uploaded, file name is displayed with file size, no error messages appear

steps.action: Review all entered data for accuracy
steps.expectedResult: All fields display the entered data correctly

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request within 2 seconds, request is saved to ScheduleChangeRequests table, status is automatically set to 'Pending Approval', confirmation message is displayed stating 'Your schedule change request has been submitted successfully. Request ID: [ID]', page redirects to confirmation page or displays success notification

steps.action: Verify the request appears in the employee's request history or dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Submitted request is visible with status 'Pending Approval' and all entered details are correctly displayed

postconditions: Schedule change request is saved in the database with unique request ID
Request status is set to 'Pending Approval'
Uploaded attachment is stored and linked to the request
Employee can view the submitted request in their request history
Request is available in the approval workflow queue

testCases.title: Verify rejection of submission with missing mandatory fields
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system with valid credentials
Employee has necessary permissions to access schedule change request page
Schedule change request page is accessible

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule change request page from the main dashboard or menu
steps.expectedResult: Schedule change request form is displayed with all mandatory fields marked with asterisks (*) or 'Required' labels

steps.action: Leave the Employee Name field empty
steps.expectedResult: Field remains empty without immediate validation error (validation occurs on blur or submit)

steps.action: Leave the Current Schedule field empty
steps.expectedResult: Field remains empty without immediate validation error

steps.action: Leave the Requested Schedule field empty
steps.expectedResult: Field remains empty without immediate validation error

steps.action: Leave the Reason for Change field empty
steps.expectedResult: Field remains empty without immediate validation error

steps.action: Leave the Effective Date field empty
steps.expectedResult: Field remains empty without immediate validation error

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button without filling any mandatory fields
steps.expectedResult: Form submission is blocked, page does not refresh or navigate away, inline validation error messages appear next to each empty mandatory field (e.g., 'Employee Name is required', 'Current Schedule is required', 'Requested Schedule is required', 'Reason for Change is required', 'Effective Date is required'), empty fields are highlighted with red borders or error styling, focus moves to the first invalid field

steps.action: Fill in only the Employee Name field with valid data (e.g., 'Jane Doe') and attempt to submit again
steps.expectedResult: Form submission is still blocked, error messages remain for all other empty mandatory fields, Employee Name field error is cleared and field shows valid styling

steps.action: Progressively fill in each mandatory field one by one and observe validation behavior
steps.expectedResult: As each field is filled with valid data, its corresponding error message disappears and field styling changes to valid state, remaining empty fields continue to show error messages

steps.action: Verify that the Submit button remains disabled or submission continues to be blocked until all mandatory fields are completed
steps.expectedResult: Submit button functionality prevents submission until all mandatory field validations pass

postconditions: No data is saved to the database
User remains on the schedule change request form
Form retains any valid data entered by the user
Error messages are clearly visible for all validation failures

testCases.title: Test attachment upload validation
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system with valid credentials
Employee has necessary permissions to submit schedule change requests
Schedule change request page is accessible
Test files are prepared: one file exceeding 10MB size limit (e.g., 12MB PDF), one invalid file type (e.g., .exe or .bat file), one valid file (e.g., 5MB PDF)

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule change request page from the main dashboard or menu
steps.expectedResult: Schedule change request form is displayed with attachment upload section visible, accepted file types and size limits are displayed (e.g., 'Accepted formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG. Maximum size: 10MB')

steps.action: Click on the attachment upload button
steps.expectedResult: File browser dialog opens allowing file selection

steps.action: Select a file that exceeds the 10MB size limit (e.g., 12MB PDF file)
steps.expectedResult: File upload is rejected, validation error message is displayed stating 'File size exceeds the maximum limit of 10MB', file is not uploaded, no file name appears in the attachment area

steps.action: Click on the attachment upload button again
steps.expectedResult: File browser dialog opens again for new file selection

steps.action: Select a file with an invalid file type (e.g., .exe or .bat file)
steps.expectedResult: File upload is rejected, validation error message is displayed stating 'Invalid file type. Accepted formats are: PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG', file is not uploaded, no file name appears in the attachment area

steps.action: Clear any error messages and click on the attachment upload button again
steps.expectedResult: File browser dialog opens, previous error messages are cleared

steps.action: Select a valid file that meets all requirements (e.g., 5MB PDF file named 'schedule_justification.pdf')
steps.expectedResult: File upload begins with progress indicator displayed, upload completes successfully within reasonable time, file name 'schedule_justification.pdf' is displayed in the attachment area, file size '5MB' is shown next to the file name, no error messages appear, a remove/delete icon appears next to the uploaded file

steps.action: Verify the uploaded file can be previewed or downloaded (if functionality exists)
steps.expectedResult: File preview or download link is functional and displays/downloads the correct file

steps.action: Click the remove/delete icon next to the uploaded file
steps.expectedResult: File is removed from the attachment area, upload section returns to initial state allowing new file upload

steps.action: Upload the valid file again and fill in all mandatory fields with valid data, then submit the form
steps.expectedResult: Form submits successfully with the attached file, confirmation message is displayed, attachment is saved and linked to the schedule change request

postconditions: Only valid attachments within size and type constraints are accepted
Invalid attachments are rejected with clear error messages
Valid attachment is stored and associated with the schedule change request
System maintains data integrity by enforcing attachment validation rules
